# deps/skia/src/effects

set(SKIA_EFFECTS_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/src/effects")
set(SKIA_EFFECTS_INCLUDE_DIR "${SKIA_DIR}/include/effects")

file(GLOB SKIA_EFFECTS_PRIVATE_HEADERS "${SKIA_EFFECTS_DIR}/*.h")
file(GLOB SKIA_EFFECTS_SOURCES "${SKIA_EFFECTS_DIR}/*.cpp")
file(GLOB SKIA_EFFECTS_PUBLIC_HEADERS "${SKIA_EFFECTS_INCLUDE_DIR}/*.h")

list(APPEND SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_EFFECTS_PUBLIC_HEADERS})
list(APPEND SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_EFFECTS_PRIVATE_HEADERS} ${SKIA_EFFECTS_SOURCES})

set(SKIA_HEADERS ${SKIA_HEADERS} PARENT_SCOPE)
set(SKIA_SOURCES ${SKIA_SOURCES} PARENT_SCOPE)
